title: Noddy Goes to School
description: Noddy is having a very good day. Everybody keeps telling him how marvellous he is. But it all goes to his head and he is soon singing songs about how wonderful he is! When Big-Ears sees how Noddy has changed, he decides to send him to school. Itâ€™s time Noddy learnt a couple of lessons. . .
author: Enid Blyton
